TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: Contains a collection of controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是唯讀的控制項集合，通常是供和管理集合的控制項控制項。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by and controls to manage sets of controls. A控制使用維持一份所有物件控制項在頁面上，而控制使用物件來追蹤它所包含的控制項。A control uses a object to keep a list of all the controls on a page, whereas a control uses a object to track the controls that it contains. > [!NOTE] > 集合同時包含控制項和其他伺服器控制項 （例如使用者控制項、 自訂控制項和 ASP.NET 控制項） 放入區域，以及做為 Web 組件的應用程式的一部分。The collection contains both controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in zones and used as part of Web Parts applications. 所以舉例來說，如果您有區域在頁面中，並在其中您可以宣告自訂控制項和 ASP.NET控制項，這兩個控制項將處於參考集合屬性。So, for example, if you have a zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom control and the ASP.NET control, both controls will be in the collection referenced by the property. 物件存在，因此 Web 組件控制項集合可以搭配強型別的集合。The object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections. 同樣地，如果您想要執行的一組大量作業控制項，您可以取得的參考物件使用屬性。Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of controls, you can get a reference to a object using the property. 比方說，您可能想要重複使用所有頁面上的控制項，並變更其外觀以某種方式。For example, you might want to loop through all the controls on a page and change their appearance in some way. 即使物件是唯讀，您可以對基礎的控制項集合中所參考的屬性以程式設計方式變更。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用Web 組件頁面上的物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the object on a Web Parts page. 這個範例有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The code for the page in a partial class. - 網頁包含之控制項。The Web page that contains the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 程式碼範例的第一個部分包含在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 請注意，`Button1_Click`方法會建立包含之所有物件，中參考的控制項屬性，其中包含所有頁面上的控制項。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 方法會逐一查看所有控制項，並切換每個控制項屬性，決定控制項是否為標準或最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含控制項的網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 請注意，宣告中的控制項`WebPartZone1`是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，但因為它們會包裝為控制項在執行階段，而類別繼承自類別中，控制項就會自動視為控制項在執行階段，因此包含在物件。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器，並按一下頁面載入之後**切換 ChromeState**按鈕時，部分類別中的程式碼執行迴圈物件或者降到最低的控制項，或者回到正常。After you load the page in a browser and click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果您重複按**切換 BulletedList1 標題**按鈕時，最上層控制項的標題變更為替代值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化空的執行個體類別。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 物件本身為唯讀，並沒有方法將個別控制項以它; 因此，您必須使用這個建構函式很少的情況。The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of a object by passing in an collection of controls.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a object by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的執行個體傳入的集合類別控制項。The constructor initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of controls. 雖然物件處於唯讀狀態且沒有任何個別的控制項加入的方法，建立您自己集合的控制項，並將其以傳遞建構函式。Although a object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own collection of controls, and pass that to the constructor. 這可讓您建立自訂的集合，然後執行大量作業在其上。This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them. 您也可以存取集合中的基礎控制項，並以程式設計方式變更其屬性值。You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用Web 組件頁面上的建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor on a Web Parts page. 這個範例有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The code for the page in a partial class. - 網頁包含之控制項。The Web page that contains the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 程式碼範例的第一個部分包含在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 請注意，`Button1_Click`方法會建立包含之所有物件，中參考的控制項屬性，其中包含所有頁面上的控制項。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 方法會逐一查看所有控制項，並切換每個控制項屬性，決定控制項是否為標準或最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含控制項的網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 請注意，宣告中的控制項`WebPartZone1`是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，但因為它們會包裝為控制項在執行階段，而類別繼承自類別中，控制項就會自動視為控制項在執行階段，因此包含在物件。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**切換 ChromeState**按鈕，並注意在部分類別中的程式碼循環物件或者降到最低的控制項，或者回到正常。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, and notice that the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果您重複按**切換 BulletedList1 標題**按鈕時，最上層控制項的標題變更為替代值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，當您想要組合可以包含自訂陣列控制項物件，這些控制項的子集或超集的這些控制項。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個控制項 [Web 組件] 頁面上，及您需要知道一個相對於其他控制項的序數位置。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.

summary.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引子可讓您存取基礎控制項，藉由索引物件，並變更其屬性值或呼叫方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用Web 組件頁面上的索引子。The following code example demonstrates the use of the indexer on a Web Parts page. 這個範例有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The code for the page in a partial class. - 網頁包含之控制項。The Web page that contains the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 程式碼範例的第一個部分包含在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 請注意，`Button2_Click`方法會建立空物件，然後指派給它控制從`WebPartZone1.WebParts`屬性。Note that the `Button2_Click` method creates an empty object, then assigns to it the controls from the `WebPartZone1.WebParts` property. 方法會使用它的索引來存取集合中的第一個控制項，並切換其屬性值。The method accesses the first control in the collection by using its index, and toggles its property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含控制項的網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 請注意，宣告中的控制項`WebPartZone1`是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，但因為它們會包裝為控制項在執行階段，和類別繼承自類別，這些控制項可以視為控制項在執行的階段和提出的一部分物件。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls can be treated as controls at run time and made part of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**切換 BulletedList1 標題**按鈕，並注意程式碼切換控制項標題的介於兩個可用的標題選項。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, and notice that the code toggles the title of the control between the two available title choices.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(id As String) As WebPart

param.name: id
param.span: The unique identifier for a particular control in a collection.

span.span: The unique identifier for a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.

value.span: 第一個集合中其 ID 等於值。

span.span: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引子可讓您存取控制根據唯一識別項的物件。The indexer enables you to access a control in a object according to a unique identifier. > [!NOTE] > Web 組件控制項集合執行不區分大小寫比對這個屬性，以便區分大小寫不屬於唯一`id`值。The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value. 屬性也適用於識別成員在某些特殊情況下的物件。The property also works to identify members of a object in some specialized cases. 如果是控制項，這個索引子是為基礎的子控制項所包裝的識別項控制項。In the case of controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the control. 如果是控制項索引子的比對不區分大小寫的比較為基礎的控制項的識別項`id`參數，然後或屬性值。In the case of controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the or property values.
